name: Noggle Statue - Torment
description: A small wobbly statue of Stalker's Acolyte, Torment.

languages.description: Eine kleine Wackelfigur vom Akolythen des Stalkers, Pein.
languages.name: Noggle-Statue: Pein

languages.description: Une petite statue à tête oscillante de Tourment, une des disciples du Stalker.
languages.name: Statuette Noggle - Tourment

languages.description: Una statuetta del discepolo dello Stalker, Torment, con la testa tremolante.
languages.name: Statuetta Noggle - Torment

languages.description: 스토커의 어콜라이트, 토멘트의 갸웃거리는 작은 인형입니다.
languages.name: 노글 스태츄 - 토멘트

languages.description: Una pequeña y tambaleante estatua de uno de los discípulos de Stalker, Tormento.
languages.name: Estatua Tambaleante - Tormento

languages.description: 一小座追猎者追随者折磨摇头娃娃
languages.name: 折磨摇头娃娃

languages.description: Stalkerの従者のボブルヘッド人形、Torment。
languages.name: Torment ボブルヘッド

languages.description: Mała, chwiejna figurka Akolity Stalkera: Męka.
languages.name: Figurka Noggle — Męka

languages.description: Uma estatueta articulada de um discípulo do Stalker, Suplício.
languages.name: Estatueta: Suplício

languages.description: 一小座 Stalker 的追隨者－折磨的搖頭娃娃。
languages.name: 折磨搖頭娃娃

languages.description: รูปปั้นตุ๊กตาหัวโยกขนาดเล็กของผู้ช่วยเหลือ Stalker - Torment
languages.name: รูปปั้น Noggle - Torment

languages.description: Stalker Acolyte, Torment küçük oynar figür.
languages.name: Noggle Heykeli - Torment

languages.description: Статуетка прибічника Сталкера на ім’я Мука.
languages.name: Ноґл «Мука»
